verses.verse: Pursue <S%G1377><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> yet <S%G1161><s%> desire <S%G2206><s%> earnestly <S%G2206><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> [gifts,] but especially <S%G3123><s%> that you may prophesy. <S%G4395><s%>

For one who speaks <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%> does not speak <S%G2980><s%> to men, <S%G444><s%> but to God; <S%G2316><s%> for no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> understands, <S%G191><s%> but in [his] spirit <S%G4151><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> mysteries. <S%G3466><s%>
But one who prophesies <S%G4395><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> to men <S%G444><s%> for edification <S%G3619><s%> and exhortation <S%G3874><s%> and consolation. <S%G3889><s%>
One who speaks <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%> edifies <S%G3618><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> but one who prophesies <S%G4395><s%> edifies <S%G3618><s%> the church. <S%G1577><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I wish <S%G2309><s%> that you all <S%G3956><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> in tongues, <S%G1100><s%> but [even] more <S%G3123><s%> that you would prophesy; <S%G4395><s%> and greater <S%G3173><s%> is one who prophesies <S%G4395><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> one who speaks <S%G2980><s%> in tongues, <S%G1100><s%> unless <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he interprets, <S%G1329><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that the church <S%G1577><s%> may receive <S%G2983><s%> edifying. <S%G3619><s%>

But now, <S%G3568><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> to you speaking <S%G2980><s%> in tongues, <S%G1100><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I profit <S%G5623><s%> you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> to you either <S%G2228><s%> by way <S%G1722><s%> of revelation <S%G602><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of prophecy <S%G4394><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of teaching <S%G1322><s%>?

Yet <S%G3676><s%> [even] lifeless <S%G895><s%> things, <S%G895><s%> either <S%G1535><s%> flute <S%G836><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> harp, <S%G2788><s%> in producing <S%G1325><s%> a sound, <S%G5456><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they do not produce <S%G1325><s%> a distinction <S%G1293><s%> in the tones, <S%G5353><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will it be known <S%G1097><s%> what is played <S%G832><s%> on the flute <S%G832><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> on the harp <S%G2789><s%>?
For if <S%G1437><s%> the bugle <S%G4536><s%> produces <S%G1325><s%> an indistinct <S%G82><s%> sound, <S%G5456><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> will prepare <S%G3903><s%> himself for battle <S%G4171><s%>?

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> you, unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you utter <S%G1325><s%> by the tongue <S%G1100><s%> speech <S%G3056><s%> that is clear, <S%G2154><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will it be known <S%G1097><s%> what is spoken <S%G2980><s%>? For you will be speaking <S%G2980><s%> into the air. <S%G109><s%>

There are, perhaps, <S%G5177><s%> a great <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> kinds <S%G1085><s%> of languages <S%G5456><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> [kind] is without <S%G880><s%> meaning. <S%G880><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> I do not know <S%G3609><s%> the meaning <S%G1411><s%> of the language, <S%G5456><s%> I shall be to the one who speaks <S%G2980><s%> a barbarian, <S%G915><s%> and the one who speaks <S%G2980><s%> will be a barbarian <S%G915><s%> to me.

So <S%G3779><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> you, since <S%G1893><s%> you are zealous <S%G2207><s%> of spiritual <S%G4151><s%> [gifts,] seek <S%G2212><s%> to abound <S%G4052><s%> for the edification <S%G3619><s%> of the church. <S%G1577><s%>
Therefore <S%G1352><s%> let one who speaks <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue <S%G1100><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> that he may interpret. <S%G1329><s%>
For if <S%G1437><s%> I pray <S%G4336><s%> in a tongue, <S%G1100><s%> my spirit <S%G4151><s%> prays, <S%G4336><s%> but my mind <S%G3563><s%> is unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> is [the outcome] then <S%G3767><s%>? I shall pray <S%G4336><s%> with the spirit <S%G4151><s%> and I shall pray <S%G4336><s%> with the mind <S%G3563><s%> also; <S%G2532><s%> I shall sing <S%G5567><s%> with the spirit <S%G4151><s%> and I shall sing <S%G5567><s%> with the mind <S%G3563><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

Otherwise <S%G1893><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you bless <S%G2127><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> [only,] how <S%G4459><s%> will the one who fills <S%G378><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> of the ungifted <S%G2399><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> the "Amen <S%G281><s%>" at your giving <S%G2169><s%> of thanks, <S%G2169><s%> since <S%G1894><s%> he does not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you are saying <S%G3004><s%>?
For you are giving <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> enough, <S%G2573><s%> but the other <S%G2087><s%> man <S%G2087><s%> is not edified. <S%G3618><s%>
I thank <S%G2168><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> in tongues <S%G1100><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> than you all; <S%G3956><s%>

however, <S%G235><s%> in the church <S%G1577><s%> I desire <S%G2309><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> with my mind, <S%G3563><s%> that I may instruct <S%G2727><s%> others <S%G243><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> rather <S%G2228><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> ten <S%G3463><s%> thousand <S%G3463><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> in a tongue. <S%G1100><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> do not be children <S%G3813><s%> in your thinking; <S%G5424><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> in evil <S%G2549><s%> be babes, <S%G3515><s%> but in your thinking <S%G5424><s%> be mature. <S%G5046><s%>

In the Law <S%G3551><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> "By men <S%G2084><s%> of strange <S%G2084><s%> tongues <S%G2084><s%> and by the lips <S%G5491><s%> of strangers <S%G2087><s%> I will speak <S%G2980><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> and even <S%G3761><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> they will not listen <S%G1522><s%> to Me," says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

So <S%G5620><s%> then <S%G5620><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> are for a sign, <S%G4592><s%> not to those <S%G3588><s%> who believe, <S%G4100><s%> but to unbelievers; <S%G571><s%> but prophecy <S%G4394><s%> [is for a sign], not to unbelievers, <S%G571><s%> but to those <S%G3588><s%> who believe. <S%G4100><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> should assemble <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%> in tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and ungifted <S%G2399><s%> men <S%G2399><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unbelievers <S%G571><s%> enter, <S%G1525><s%> will they not say <S%G3004><s%> that you are mad <S%G3105><s%>?

But if <S%G1437><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> and an unbeliever <S%G571><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an ungifted <S%G2399><s%> man <S%G2399><s%> enters, <S%G1525><s%> he is convicted <S%G1651><s%> by all, <S%G3956><s%> he is called <S%G350><s%> to account <S%G350><s%> by all; <S%G3956><s%>

the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of his heart <S%G2588><s%> are disclosed; <S%G5318><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> he will fall <S%G4098><s%> on his face <S%G4383><s%> and worship <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> declaring <S%G518><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> is certainly <S%G3689><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you.

What <S%G5101><s%> is [the outcome] then, <S%G3767><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>? When <S%G3752><s%> you assemble, <S%G4905><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1538><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a psalm, <S%G5568><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a teaching, <S%G1322><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a revelation, <S%G602><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a tongue, <S%G1100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> an interpretation. <S%G2058><s%> Let all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%> for edification. <S%G3619><s%>

If <S%G1535><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> speaks <S%G2980><s%> in a tongue, <S%G1100><s%> [it should be] by two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> at the most <S%G4183><s%> three, <S%G5140><s%> and [each] in turn, <S%G3313><s%> and let one <S%G1520><s%> interpret; <S%G1329><s%>

but if <S%G1437><s%> there is no <S%G3361><s%> interpreter, <S%G1328><s%> let him keep <S%G4601><s%> silent <S%G4601><s%> in the church; <S%G1577><s%> and let him speak <S%G2980><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> and to God. <S%G2316><s%>
And let two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> and let the others <S%G243><s%> pass <S%G1252><s%> judgment. <S%G1252><s%>
But if <S%G1437><s%> a revelation <S%G601><s%> is made <S%G601><s%> to another <S%G243><s%> who is seated, <S%G2521><s%> let the first <S%G4413><s%> keep <S%G4601><s%> silent. <S%G4601><s%>

For you can <S%G1410><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> one <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> by one, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1520><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> may learn <S%G3129><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> may be exhorted; <S%G3870><s%>
and the spirits <S%G4151><s%> of prophets <S%G4396><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to prophets; <S%G4396><s%>
for God <S%G2316><s%> is not [a God] of confusion <S%G181><s%> but of peace, <S%G1515><s%> as in all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

Let the women <S%G1135><s%> keep <S%G4601><s%> silent <S%G4601><s%> in the churches; <S%G1577><s%> for they are not permitted <S%G2010><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> but let them subject <S%G5293><s%> themselves, just <S%G2531><s%> as the Law <S%G3551><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> says. <S%G3004><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> they desire <S%G2309><s%> to learn <S%G3129><s%> anything, <S%G5100><s%> let them ask <S%G1905><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> at home; <S%G3624><s%> for it is improper <S%G150><s%> for a woman <S%G1135><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> in church. <S%G1577><s%>
Was it from you that the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> [first] went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%>? Or <S%G2228><s%> has it come <S%G2658><s%> to you only <S%G3441><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> thinks <S%G1380><s%> he is a prophet <S%G4396><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> let him recognize <S%G1921><s%> that the things which <S%G3739><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to you are the Lord's commandment. <S%G1785><s%>
But if <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> does not recognize <S%G50><s%> [this], he is not recognized. <S%G50><s%>

Therefore, <S%G5620><s%> my brethren, <S%G80><s%> desire <S%G2206><s%> earnestly <S%G2206><s%> to prophesy, <S%G4395><s%> and do not forbid <S%G2967><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> in tongues. <S%G1100><s%>
But let all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%> properly <S%G2156><s%> and in an orderly <S%G5010><s%> manner. <S%G5010><s%>
